title: What is the best soap for soft water? Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no good or bad soap for soft water, there is only the correct ammount of it. As you can se on the backside of the washing powder there is scale of hardness in French or German degres, which correlate with ammount of Ca and Mg in the water. The grater the value, harder is the water. So, if you have soft water (rain water, water from softening device) just be carefull with the ammount of soap
